attributes.action: Consider the award of an Afghanistan Reconstruction Service Medal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Civilians from a variety of backgrounds and institutions continue to make significant sacrifices throughout Afghanistan; many undertaking reconstruction work in hazardous and extremely uncomfortable conditions across the British Forward Operating Bases in Helmand.   A non-monetary recognition in the form of a Afghanistan Reconstruction Service Medal to reflect the commitment and sacrifices made by both the individuals and their families in the ongoing reconstruction of Afghanistan would be welcome; similar in intent to the award of the Iraq Reconstruction Service Medal (IRSM).
